value.title: Wells Fargo $2,500 Premier Checking Bonus
value.description: Requires $250,000 in cash or investments. Must be opened in a Wells Fargo branch. Account also has a $35 month fee, waived if you have $250,00 balance.

value.title: Wells Fargo $525 Savings Bonus
value.description: Requires $25,000 deposit. Must be opened in a Wells Fargo branch. Should stack well with the above-mentioned Wells Fargo Premier checking bonus.

value.title: PSECU $300 Checking Bonus
value.description: This is technically PA only, but anybody can join Pennsylvania Recreation and Park Society (PRPS) for $20 and you get $10 of that back.

value.title: PNC $200/$400 Checking Bonus
value.description: The offer available depends on where you live.

value.title: First Tech Federal Credit Union $350
value.description: This is really a $200 checking bonus and then another $150 that requires $1,500 in spend in specific categories.

value.title: Gateway First Bank $250 Bonus
value.description: Main downside of this bonus is that it’s not displayed prominently.

value.title: US Alliance Financial $250 Checking Bonus
value.description:
Read our full post
Soft pull
No credit card funding
Direct deposit of $2,000+ required for three months

value.title: Oxygen $110 Referral Bonus
value.description: Nice if you can refer P2.

value.title: Affinity Federal Credit Union $100 Referral Bonus
value.description: Affinity have offered a $150 bonus in this past, this is better if you’re referred by a friend or family member and they are happy to give some of their bonus.

value.title: GO2Bank $100 Referral Checking Bonus
value.description: It might also be possible to go through a portal for another $125.

value.title: Charles Schwab Up To $500 Bonus
value.description: This is now a soft pull making it much more interesting. People like this account because the account is quite useful (e.g ATM fees reimbursed, no fees for foreign transaction withdrawals) and you can also get this account and a brokerage account at the same time for one hard pull. The brokerage account then gives you access to the Charles Schwab credit cards. Obviously not for everybody, but a pretty good combination.

value.title: Thrivent $200 Checking Bonus – Christian Faith Required
value.description: This is available nationwide but you must be of Christian Faith or married to somebody who is. They are also ChexSystems sensitive.

value.title: Christian Community Credit Union – $200 Bonus – Must Be A Member of A Christian Ministry
value.description: The Christian Ministry requirement seems to be enforced and will rule out a lot of people, if you are eligible though this is a great deal.
value.directDepositDetails: direct deposit with no minimum specified

value.title: Lili Bank $100 + $100
value.description: Can get $100 via referral and another $100 via drop/Swagbucks.

value.title: Revolut Savings Bank $50
value.description: Account also earns 5% APY.

value.title: Kinecta $250 Bonus
value.description: Similar to the Amalgamated bonus readers are having difficulties getting approved for this bonus.

value.title: Fidelity Bloom $100 Bonus
value.description: Signup and a simple $50 deposit gets you $100. Use promo code FIDELITY100. Works on a a Fidelity Cash Management account, investment account, Roth IRA, or Traditional IRA account.

value.title: Fidelity Bloom $80 Bonus
value.description: Signup and a simple $25 deposit gets you $50. Deposit $300 and get $30. Future years you can deposit $300 and get $15.

value.title: Fidelity Youth Account $50
value.description: Must be aged 13 – 17 to be eligible.

value.title: Citi Up To $2,000 Bonus – No Direct Deposit Required
value.description: This is really more of a savings bonus as it requires a large deposit. Works out to be 10% APY for the best bonus.

value.title: Discover $150-$200 Savings Bonus
value.description: $150 bonus requires $15,000 deposit and $200 bonus requires $25,000 deposit. There is also a $500 version that requires a $50,000 deposit but that isn’t currently available. Keep in mind that cumulative deposits work.

value.title: Associated Bank – $200 Savings Bonus  – IA, IL, IN, KS, MI, MN, MO, OH and WI
value.description: Can be combined with the $400 checking bonus.

value.title: Alliant Credit Union $100 Savings Bonus
value.description: Requires depositing $100 each month for 12 months to get the $100 bonus.

value.title: Waterstone Bank $100 Savings – WI only
value.description: Can also be combined with the $250 checking bonus.

value.title: Marcus $100 Savings Bonus
value.description:
Read our full post
Soft pull
No credit card funding
Deposit of $10,000 in new money is required

value.title: U.S. Bank Business Checking $500/$750 Bonus
value.description: There is a $750 bonus and $500 bonus.

value.title: American Express Business Checking 30,000 Points
value.description: Requires $5,000 in deposits for 60 days and also 10 transactions. Fairly simple bonus to do a nice bonus (though it was once higher at 60k).

value.title: Citibank Up To $2,000 Business Checking Bonus – In Branch Only
value.description: Only available in branch and not all branches have this offer. This is more of a savings bonus as the $2,000 bonus requires a deposit of $200,000+ for example.

value.title: Bank of America $200 Business Checking
value.description: There is a $500 targeted bonus. But it’s not often we see public bonuses.

value.title: Axos Bank $100/$200 Business Checking
value.description: Just need an average balance of $2,500+ for the first two months. Bonus is $200 if business must be incorporated after 6/01/2020

value.title: Live Oak Bank $300 Business Savings
value.description: Requires a $30,000 deposit but does offer 4% APY.

value.title: Truist $400 AL, AR, GA, FL, IN, KY, MD, MS, NC, NJ, OH, PA, SC, TN, TX, VA, WV or DC
value.description: Bonus was recently increased to $400 from $200.

value.title: Citizens Bank $500 – CT, DE, MA, MI, NH, NJ, NY, OH, PA, RI, VT, VA, D.C., MD, FL
value.description: Previously this was a targeted offer, but now it’s a public offer.

value.title: Bank Novo $100 Referral Bonus
value.description: Looks like you can get an extra $33 by going through Swagbucks as well.

value.title: Huntington Bank $200/$500/$1,000 – OH, MI, IN, PA, KY, WV & IL
value.description: The $400 bonus has been increased to $500. $750 bonus has been increased to $1,000.

value.title: PNC $200/$500 Business Checking AL, DC, DE, FL, GA, IL, IN, KY, MD, MI, MO, NC, NJ, NY, OH, PA, SC, VA, WI and WV
value.description: Not nationwide like the personal bonus unfortunately. They have offered a $300 bonus in the past, but that hasn’t been available for some time. It’s also now easier to keep the account fee free and because of that we’ve added it back to this list. In some states this is now $500.

value.title: M&T Bank $500 Business Checking Bonus – CT, DE, D.C., MD, NJ, NY, PA, VA, WV
value.description: Has been $400 in the past, but we haven’t seen an offer that high for some time.

value.title: Seacoast Bank $300 Business Checking Bonus – FL Only
value.description: This needs to be opened in branch but only requires a minimum balance of $1,500 for 90 days to trigger the bonus.

value.title: WinTrust Community Bank $500 Bonus – IL, WI, FL
value.description: Now available in more states, requirements are easy as well.

value.title: Banner Bank $300 OR, WA, CA & ID
value.description: There is also a $100 savings bonus.

value.title: Farm Bureau Bank $250 – NV
value.description: There is also a $150 personal checking bonus but not clear if both of these bonuses can be done.

value.title: 1st United Credit Union – $200 Business Checking Bonus – CA only
value.description: Normally in branch only but can also be opened online.

value.title: Provident Credit Union $150 In Branch Business Checking Bonus – CA
value.description:
Read our full post
Soft pull
Credit card funding up to $1,000
Two $500 direct deposits required

value.title: FirstBank $300 – CA, AZ, CO – Direct Deposit Optional
value.description: Standard bonus is $200 and that requires a direct deposit. This one is $300 and you can either do a direct deposit or spend $500 on a debit card.

value.title: TBK Bank $600 Bonus – CO, IA, IL, KS & TX
value.description: Unfortunately it requires a huge direct deposit, but can be done over multiple direct deposits.

value.title: Flushing Bank $700 Bonus – NY & NJ – Direct Deposit Optional
value.description: No monthly fees to worry about or direct deposit. Does require depositing $50,000+ for the full bonus though, really more of a combination savings & checking bonus.

value.title: bankESB (East Hampton Savings Bank) $200 – Direct Deposit Not Required – MA, CT
value.description: Direct deposit isn’t required but account needs to be open for one year to receive $50 of the bonus. The upside is that the account has no monthly fees to worry about.

value.title: First Federal Credit Union $200 Checking Bonus – IA only – No Direct Deposit Required
value.description: Nice bonus with no monthly fee or direct deposit requirement.

value.title: Citizens Bank $400  Checking Bonuses – CT, DE, MA, MI, NH, NJ, NY, OH, PA, RI, VT, D.C.
value.description: This is the highest bonus they have offered, although there was a targeted offer for $600 last year.

value.title: M&T Bank $450 Checking Bonus – CT, DE, D.C., MD, NJ, NY, PA, VA, WV
value.description: This is really a $350 checking + $100 savings bonus but the requirements for both offers are easy.

value.title: Credit Union 1 $500 – IL Only
value.description: Unfortunately there is mixed datapoints on this being a hard or soft pull and it also requires direct deposits for three months.
value.directDepositDetails: direct deposit of $1,000+ required for three months

value.title: Ballston Spa National Bank (BSNB) $250 Checking Bonus – Some Areas of NY
value.description: Previously this had to be opened in branch, but now it can be opened online as well.

value.title: Waterstone Bank $250 Checking – WI only
value.description: No monthly fee. There is also a $100 money market bonus.

value.title: First National Bank (FNB) $400 Checking Bonus – PA, OH, MD, DC, VA, NC, SC, WV
value.description: Nice big bonus with small requirements and you only need eStatements to keep it fee free. There was a $600 version of this bonus in the past, but that was available in less areas.
value.directDepositDetails: direct deposits totaling $2,5000+ required within 90 days

value.title: Associated Bank – $400 Bonus  – IA, IL, IN, KS, MI, MN, MO, OH and WI
value.description: Huge bonus, does require a large balance of $10,000+ for a short period of time for the full $400 bonus but well worth doing if you have the spare funds. Available in a lot more states now.

value.title: United States Senate Federal Credit Union $500 – VA Only
value.description: No monthly fees to worry about and relatively easy requirements.

value.title: NVE Bank $600 Checking – NJ Only
value.description: We still need to know if this is a hard or soft pull, but even if it’s a hard pull it should be worth doing.

value.title: CIBM Bank $250/$600 Checking Bonus IN, IL, WI
value.description: The $250 bonus doesn’t require a direct deposit, but the $600 bonus does.

value.title: Truist $400 AL, AR, GA, FL, IN, KY, MD, MS, NC, NJ, OH, PA, SC, TN, TX, VA, WV or DC
value.description: Bonus was recently increased to $400 from $200.

value.title: Bay First $400 Bonus – FL only
value.description: Previously called First Home Bank. Much bigger than the previous $200 bonus and a nice amount of credit card funding.
value.directDepositDetails: direct deposit required, no minimum specified

value.title: HomeTrust Bank $400 Bonus  NC, SC, TN, VA
value.description: Previous best bonus was $150.

value.title: PeoplesBank $400 Checking – MD & PA
value.description: There are no monthly fees.

value.title: Fulton Bank $300 – DE, DC, MD, NJ, PA, & VA – Direct Deposit Not Required
value.description: Nice bonus that only requires 15 debit card transactions to trigger. Bonus has been increased to $300 from $200.

value.title: First Bank Financial Centre (FBFC) $150 Bonus – Direct Deposit Not Required – WI Only
value.description: No monthly fees or direct deposit required. $150 donation is also made to a local school program.

value.title: WinTrust Bank $300 Checking – IL, FL, WI, IN only
value.description: Much better than the $100 bonus they previously offered. There is also a $200 savings bonus that can be done at the same time.
value.directDepositDetails: direct deposit required, no minimum specified

value.title: Dedham Savings Bank – $250 Bonus – MA only
value.description: Better than the standard $100 offer they usually have.
value.directDepositDetails: direct deposit with no minimum specified

value.title: Hawthorn Bank $300 MO, KS
value.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

value.title: Seacoast Bank $350 Bonus – FL only
value.description: There is also a $150 savings bonus that can be done at the same time.

value.title: Old National Bank $300/$450 Bonus – IA, IL, IN, KY, MN & MI
value.description: Small amount of credit card funding on offer, simple to keep the monthly fee waived as well.

value.title: USE Credit Union $300 Bonus – CA
value.description: Unfortunately seems to be a hard pull if applying online.

value.title: Central Bank $300 – OK, IL KS & MO, CO
value.description: Can also be combined with a $100 savings bonus as well.

value.title: Premier Bank $200 Bonus – OH, MI, IN and PA
value.description: Has been as high as $200 in the past.

value.title: HarborOne Bank $200 Checking & Savings Bonus – MA, NH, and RI
value.description: They have offered a bigger bonus in the past, but the requirements for this bonus are much easier to meet. There is also a $450 checking + $300 savings for those in Boston.

value.title: Citadel Bank $300 Checking Bonus – PA only
value.description: You can also get a $100 savings bonus from Citadel as well which is nice. No monthly fees to worry about either.

value.title: Provident Credit Union $300 Checking Bonus – CA only
value.description: Requires 2 x $400 in debit spend and 2 x $500 direct deposit, but if can manage those it’s a nice bonus. There is a hard pull.

value.title: First Bank – $300 Checking Bonus – CA, IL & MO
value.description: Annoying to keep the account fee free, there is also a $200 business checking bonus that can be done at the same time.

value.title: Landmark Credit Union $300 – WI, IL
value.description: Previously had targeted language but that has been removed.
value.directDepositDetails: requires a recurring monthly direct deposit of at least $250

value.title: First Financial Bank $200 Checking Bonus, Direct Deposit Not Required – IL, IN, KY, OH
value.description: Very easy bonus to meet the requirements for.

value.title: South State Bank $200 checking Bonus – GA, NC, SC, VA – Direct Deposit Not Required
value.description: Doesn’t require a direct deposit either.

value.title: First Bank $200 – VA & MD – Direct Deposit Not Required
value.description: This one does have a monthly fee, but fairly easy to avoid plus a nice amount of credit card funding. Direct deposit no longer required and bonus has been increased from $100 to $200.

value.title: BMI Federal Credit Union $200 – OH – Direct Deposit Not Required
value.description: Main downside is there are mixed reports of this being a hard or soft pull.

value.title: Idaho Central Credit Union (ICCU) $200 Bonus – ID, WA, OR, Direct Deposit Not Required
value.description: Most of the requirements for this bonus are really easy, but you do need to complete a financial check up for $50 of the bonus.

value.title: Citadel Bank $300 Checking Bonus – PA only
value.description: You can also get a $100 savings bonus from Citadel as well which is nice. No monthly fees to worry about either.

value.title: KeyPoint Credit Union $300 Checking – CA Only
value.description: Big bonus with a nice amount of credit card funding.

value.title: Broadway Bank $300 – TX
value.description: This is the biggest bonus we’ve seen from this bank, previously it was $250.

value.title: Fidelity Bank $300 – MA, NH Only
value.description: Unfortunately requires a lot of debit card transactions for two months.

value.title: Royal Credit Union $250 Checking Bonus – MN, WI
value.description: No monthly fee to worry about and nice amount of credit card funding

value.title: Blue Federal Credit Union $200 Bonus CO, WY – In Branch Only
value.description: Previously this was nationwide, but looks like you need to go in branch now.

value.title: Newtown Savings Bank (NSB) $250 Bonus  – CT & Select Counties In NY only
value.description: Bonus used to be better when you could fund $1,000 with a credit card, although then the actual bonus was less. Also comes with a $150 savings bonus.
value.directDepositDetails: direct deposit required but no minimum specified

value.title: Banner Bank $200 OR, WA, CA & ID
value.description: Looks like you might actually need to open in branch to be eligible.

value.title: Credit Human $200 Bonus – TX only
value.description: No monthly fee to worry about and bonus has recently increased from $100 to $200.
value.directDepositDetails: two direct deposits of $100+ within 60 days of account opening

value.title: Bar Harbor Bank & Trust $200 Checking Bonus – ME, VT & NH
value.description: They offer a free checking account.

value.title: Pinnacle Financial Partners $200 Mastercard Checking Bonus – TN
value.description: A lot of requirements unfortunately for the bonus.
value.directDepositDetails: direct deposit required, must be full paycheck

value.title: Teachers Credit Union $200 IN & MI
value.description: Nice amount of credit card funding is available as well.

value.title: Old Second Bank $300 Bonus – IL only
value.description: Another small bonus, upside is that $100 can be done without a direct deposit being required.
value.directDepositDetails: two direct deposits totaling $500 or more required

value.title: Dollar Bank $300 Bonus – OH, VA & PA
value.description: Has been as high as $400 in the past with the same requirements.

value.title: KeyBank $200 Bonus – AK, CO, CT, ID, IN, MA, ME, MI, NY, OH, OR, PA, UT, VT, or WA
value.description: We have seen a recent offer with no direct deposit required.

value.title: OMNI Community Credit Union $200 – MI
value.description: This would be higher but it’s a hard pull to open.

value.title: Sandy Spring Bank $200 Bonus – MD, DC & VA
value.description: They have offered a bonus of $300 in the past, but this is easier than what that bonus required. One or two datapoints of them being ChexSystems sensitive, but others with lots of inquiries have been approved.
value.directDepositDetails: direct deposit of $500+ required for four months

value.title: Honor Credit Union $250 Checking Bonus – MI
value.description: The credit card funding is interesting, but it’s unfortunate about the $15 fee and also the hard pull to open the account.
value.directDepositDetails: direct deposit of $100+ per month required

value.title: Summit Federal Credit Union Up To $150 – NY – Direct Deposit Not Required
value.description: Requires 20 debit card purchases instead of a direct deposit.

value.title: Sharepoint Credit Union $150 Checking Bonus – MN only
value.description: Account also offers 5% APY on balances up to $5,000

value.title: Tower Federal Credit Union $100 – MD – No Requirements
value.description: This bonus has no monthly fees or requirements to trigger, making it extremely easy.

value.title: Westfield Bank $100 Bonus – OH Only – Direct Deposit Not Required
value.description: Any ACH deposit will work for this, doesn’t need to be direct deposit/payroll.
value.directDepositDetails: direct deposit or recurring ach deposit required

value.title: Orange County’s Credit Union $100 Checking Bonus – No Direct Deposit Required – CA Only
value.description: Always nice to see a bonus with no direct deposit required, in addition no monthly fees to worry about.

value.title: Community First Credit Union $175 Bonus – FL only
value.description: No monthly fees to worry about and a nice bit of credit card funding as well.

value.title: Jovia Financial Credit Union $150 Checking Bonus – NY Only
value.description: Only requires a small direct deposit and no monthly fee.

value.title: Desert Financial Credit Union $100 Referral Bonus For Both Parties – AZ only
value.description: Requires a referral, but that potentially makes it more profitable for those that do sign up if you can refer some friends/family.
value.directDepositDetails: direct deposit required, no minimum specified

value.title: Collins Community Credit Union $100 Bonus – IA only
value.description: No monthly fee to worry about and nice amount of credit card funding as well.

value.title: Power Financial Credit Union $100  – No Direct Deposit Required – FL only
value.description: Unfortunately seems to be a hard pull according to most people.

value.title: Verity Credit Union $100 Referral Bonus – WA
value.description: Nice bonus especially if you can refer a few people.

value.title: Greater Nevada Credit Union $100 – NV
value.description: Nice amount of credit card funding.

value.title: Heritage Credit Union $100 – WI & IL – In Branch
value.description: Pretty small bonus and it also needs to be opened in branch. At least there is no monthly fees to worry about.

value.title: California Coast Credit Union $100 Bonus – CA only
value.description: California Coast sometimes have good CD rates as well. This is a small bonus but worth doing if you’ve already done bigger bonuses listed above.
value.directDepositDetails: direct deposit of $500+ required for three months

value.title: USE Credit Union $100 Bonus – CA only
value.description: This is a referral bonus, so the bonus referring you will also receive $100.

value.title: Heritage Credit Union – WI & IL only – $100 Bonus
value.description: No monthly fees to worry about but a relatively small bonus.

value.title: Prestige Community Credit Union – TX – $100 Referral Bonus
value.description: This is a referral bonus, so can be a bit better if you can refer some friends or family as well. Can also get a straight $150 bonus.

value.title: Lafayette Federal Credit Union $100 – MD, D.C. & VA
value.description: You can get additional bonuses up to $750, but most of that is closing costs on a mortgage.

value.title: Financial Partners Credit Union – CA – $100 Referral Bonus
value.description: No monthly fees and the fact that it is a referral bonus makes this more attractive.

value.title: Western State Bank – $100 – AZ ND – In Branch Only
value.description: Another relatively small in branch bonus, still worth doing if you live near a branch and have done the bigger bonuses listed above.
value.directDepositDetails: direct deposit required, no minimum specified

value.title: The Bank of Princeton $100 Checking Bonus – NJ & PA, In Branch
value.description: No monthly fee is required which is nice.

value.title: City National Bank – $100 Checking – VA, WV, OH – In Branch
value.description: Not the most attractive offer given that it’s only $100 and in branch only, but still worth considering for those that have done the bigger bonuses above.

value.title: Neighborhood Credit Union $300 Checking Bonus – TX
value.description: Previously this was only a $100 bonus, so it’s nice to see it increased by such a huge amount.

value.title: Georgia’s Own Credit Union $200/$400 – GA
value.description: Unfortunately it’s a hard pull but there is now a $400 variation as well.

value.title: First Home Bank $500 – FL In Branch Only
value.description: This is a checking & savings bonus but not huge deposit requirement.

value.title: Abington Bank $300 Checking Bonus, Direct Deposit Not Required, MA Plymouth County and Norfolk County
value.description: We don’t know much about this bank, but this bonus seems easy to trigger and is much higher than normal.

value.title: Valley Strong Credit Union $250, Direct Deposit Not Required (Tulare, San Joaquin and Solano Counties)
value.description: Nice bonus with no direct deposit required.

value.title: Southland Credit Union $200 Checking Bonus – CA Long Beach
value.description: Only available at the long beach location.

value.title: Middlesex Federal MA, In Branch $150 Bonus, Direct Deposit Not Required
value.description: Unfortunately you have to open this in branch.

value.title: Cap Ed Credit Union $100, Direct Deposit Not Required ID Only
value.description: Account also has no monthly fees to worry about and might actually be available nationwide.

value.title: San Mateo Credit Union $100 Bonus – Direct Deposit Not Required – CA Only
value.description: Only available in San Mateo County, the City of Palo Alto, or certain areas of San Francisco.

value.title: Commonwealth Central Credit Union $100 Santa Clara County, CA, Direct Deposit Not Required
value.description: Unfortunately it’s a hard pull but at least no DD is required

value.title: Green State Credit Union $100 Checking Bonus – IA & IL, Direct Deposit Not Required
value.description: Just requires 12 debit card transactions to trigger the bonus.

value.title: Purdue Federal Credit Union $250 IN, Lake & Porter County
value.description: Bonus was previously only $150.
